name: FlowTemp
comment: Temperature measured on VF2

name: FlowTempDesired
comment: Desired flow temperature of MK1

name: TeleSwitch
comment: State of the Teleswitch

name: IsInHoliday
comment: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; holiday function can be started by setting the HC's corresponding bit

name: IsInStorageFilling
comment: heating circuit is locked because of ongoing tank loading unless parallel loading has been activated

name: CleaningLady
comment: saving function is activated until read value * 1/2 h

name: IsInParty
comment: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; if bit is set the party function is activated for the corresponding HC

name: HcPumpPort
comment: Status of mixer cicuit pump on MK1P

name: OtShutdownLimit
comment: For outside temperatures higher than this, there is no heat demand generated anymore

name: FlowTempMin
comment: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will at least be this value

name: TempDesiredLow
comment: Night temperature setpoint of the circuit

name: CfgHeatSinkType
comment: Type of the configurable mixer circuit

name: HcPumpIdlePeriod
comment: Time pump is not running in a pause at least

name: MixerDutyCycle
comment: Teleswitch,Pumpe,Zirkulationspumpe,WW Anforderung,WW Freigabe

name: OperatingMode
comment: Operating mode of mixer circuit

name: FlowTempMax
comment: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will maximal be this value

name: TempDesired
comment: Day temperature setpoint of the circuit

name: HeatingCurve
comment: Heating curve

name: HcMaxPreHeating
comment: maximum time central heating is released in advance of the first time window (time is adjusted according to current outside temperature)

name: HcMaxPreHeating
comment: The heating start before a time window could shifted forwards maximal this time (related to the outside temperature)

name: FloorPavingDryingDay
comment: Current day of floor paving drying routine

name: TeleswitchOperatingMode
comment: If the tele switch port is activated the mixer circuit operates in this mode
